      • send

        ResultOrErrorFuture<TxHash> send(Transaction transaction)
        Send transaction asynchronously. This method automatically fill nonce, hash and sign in a server.
        Parameters:
        transaction - transaction to commit
        Returns:
        transaction hash or error
